entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is mentioned as being brilliant at Hogwarts and not paying attention to what was going on in his own house.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is mentioned as being locked in the cellar by her father Albus.

entities.name: kendra
entities.description: Kendra is mentioned as Dumbledore's mother and a terrifying woman.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one asking questions about Ariana being locked in the cellar.

entities.name: auntie muriel
entities.description: Auntie Muriel is the one who is talking about Dumbledore's mother and Ariana being locked in the cellar.

entities.name: doge
entities.description: Doge is the one who is trying to defend Kendra.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a place where Albus was brilliant.

entities.name: cellar
entities.description: The cellar is the place where Ariana was locked in.

relationships.description: Albus is mentioned as being the father of Ariana.
Auntie Muriel is talking about Kendra, who is Dumbledore's mother.
